SELECT m.market_no ,u.user_nickname ,m.type_market ,m.market_category ,m.market_title ,m.market_content ,REGEXP_REPLACE(REVERSE(REGEXP_REPLACE(REVERSE(TO_CHAR(m.market_price)), '(\d{3})','\1,')), '^,','') market_price ,m.market_date ,r.review_count ,r.star_avg ,f.file_url
FROM TB_MARKET m, TB_USER u, (SELECT market_no, count(review_no) review_count, avg(review_star) star_avg FROM TB_M_REVIEW group by market_no) r, (SELECT file_url, market_no FROM TB_M_FILE WHERE file_step=1 ) f WHERE m.user_id = u.user_id and m.market_no=r.market_no(+) and m.market_no=f.market_no AND m.market_category != '공지사항'
AND m.market_category = #{market_category}
AND m.market_title LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND m.market_content LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND (m.market_title LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or m.market_content LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%')
ORDER BY r.review_count DESC
ORDER BY r.star_avg DESC
ORDER BY m.market_no DESC
ORDER BY m.market_price DESC
ORDER BY m.market_price ASC
ORDER BY m.market_no DESC

SELECT m.market_no ,u.user_nickname ,m.type_market ,m.market_category ,m.market_title ,m.market_content ,m.market_price ,m.market_date ,r.review_count ,r.star_avg ,f.file_url ,f.file_step FROM TB_MARKET m, TB_USER u, (SELECT market_no, count(review_no) review_count, avg(review_star) star_avg FROM TB_M_REVIEW group by market_no) r, (SELECT file_url, market_no, file_step FROM TB_M_FILE) f WHERE m.user_id = u.user_id and m.market_no=r.market_no(+) and m.market_no=f.market_no AND m.market_no = #{market_no}

SELECT u.user_id , u.user_nickname , m.review_no , m.market_no , m.type_review , m.review_star , m.review_content , m.review_date , l.like_count , COUNT(m.review_no) OVER (PARTITION BY m.market_no) AS review_count , AVG(m.review_star) OVER (PARTITION BY m.market_no) AS avg_review_star FROM TB_M_REVIEW m LEFT JOIN TB_USER u ON m.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(user_id) like_count, like_group FROM TB_LIKE WHERE like_type = 2 GROUP BY like_group ) l ON m.review_no = l.like_group WHERE m.market_no = #{market_no}
ORDER BY m.review_date DESC
ORDER BY l.like_count ASC
ORDER BY m.review_star DESC
ORDER BY m.review_star ASC
SELECT l.like_no , l.like_group FROM TB_USER u, TB_LIKE l WHERE u.user_id = l.user_id AND u.user_nickname = #{user_nickname} AND l.like_type = 2 AND l.like_no = 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_QNA (qna_no , qna_step , market_no , user_id , qna_title , qna_content , qna_date , qna_sort ) VALUES( TB_QNA_NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{qna_step}, #{market_no}, #{user_id}, #{qna_title}, #{qna_content}, TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), #{qna_sort} )
mapper.select: SELECT q.qna_no , u.user_id , u.user_nickname , q.market_no , q.qna_title , q.qna_content , q.qna_date , COUNT(*) OVER() AS qna_count FROM TB_QNA q, TB_USER u WHERE q.user_id = u.user_id and q.market_no=#{market_no} and q.qna_step=0
